property.name: proteinCount
property.formula: (select count(1) from TppProtein p where p.BandID = id and p.TOTAL_NUMBER_PEPTIDES > 0)

property.name: baitCount
property.formula: (select max(p.TOTAL_NUMBER_PEPTIDES) from TppProtein p where p.BandID = id and p.GeneID = (select b.GeneID from Bait b where b.ID = p.BaitID) group by p.GeneID)

hibernate-mapping.query: from Band b inner join fetch b.bait inner join fetch b.bait.gene order by b.id desc
from Band b inner join fetch b.bait inner join fetch b.bait.gene inner join fetch b.experiment where b.id in (:id)
from Band b inner join fetch b.bait inner join fetch b.bait.gene where b.bait.gene.id in (:id) order by b.proteinCount desc
select count(*) from Band b where b.bait.gene.id in (:id)
